predefined_profiles.name: Lele
predefined_profiles.public profile: Married to Xiao Tian, living a seemingly happy life after marriage.
predefined_profiles.goal: Aim is to conceal the affair and continue living with Xiao Tian.

predefined_profiles.name: Xiao Tian
predefined_profiles.public profile: Lele's husband, deeply loves Lele, living a happy life after marriage.
predefined_profiles.goal: Aim is to live happily with Lele forever.

scenario: Despite living a happy life with Xiao Tian after marriage, Lele had to admit being consumed by desire upon Jin's arrival. Desire is the essence of this downfall, and Lele is consciously spiraling. One night, Lele contacted Jin online again.

profile.name: Xiao Jin
profile.public profile: The person Lele got involved with after marriage.
profile.goal: The goal is to live happily ever after with Lele.

dialog.content: Although Lele and Xiao Tian have been happy since their marriage, with the arrival of Xiao Jin, Lele has to admit she is captivated. Desire is the essence of this downfall, and Lele is consciously succumbing to it. One night, Lele contacts Xiao Jin online again.
I do.
See you at the bar at eight tonight.
Alright.
Why are you all dressed up so beautifully late at night, where are you going?

content.content: I have a rare outing with my bestie today, of course, I have to dress up!
Oh, can’t I dress beautifully at home just to show my husband? Really, what are you asking for?
Why do you care? Always suspecting me of something! Spend that idle time doing more housework instead.
I decided to test this look tonight. If it's good, I’ll wear it for tomorrow’s important proposal meeting.

question: #question# How should Lele respond to convince Xiao Tian she's just going out with friends?

content.content: I’m going out with my college classmates, so I have to dress up finely, you see even my manicure is freshly done!
Where can I be going? I’m staying home with my husband, don’t you like me dressing up nicely?
Actually, I’m preparing for an important meeting tomorrow; tonight I’m practicing detail management with this outfit to ensure perfection.
Oh, it’s nothing. I just wanted to try out some new makeup products I bought. Why would I go out this late!

question: #question# How can Lele lie to make it more convincing, for instance, by using details?

dialog.content: Alright then.
Heading out this late, isn't your husband suspicious?
Let's not talk about him now that we're out.
Alright, alright, I won’t say a word! So, where to next?

content.content: Let's go to a hotel. I really want more alone time with you. I've been feeling uneasy, but I can't bear to be away from you. Let's go and have a good talk, what do you say?
Ah, I'm tired, I don't want to go anywhere. If you've got something to say, just say it and then head home.
It's too late to be wandering around. How about we just chat here?
Shall we find a café to sit in? I've been wanting to talk to you about my thoughts on a book I've been reading.

question: #question#How can Lele express her feelings to Xiao Jin?

content.content: Let's go to your place, you'll feel more comfortable there. You've been careful all along being with me, I appreciate it.
(With a cold tone) Maybe we shouldn't go anywhere. You seem pretty tired; I think I'll head home first.
I think you should handle these things yourself. Don't you have a mind of your own?
Anywhere is fine, as long as we're happy.

question: #question#How can Lele respond to show she understands Xiao Jin's feelings?

dialog.content: Great, I can’t wait either.
(Sends a message to Lele after her event) Honey, when you’re done, I’ll come pick you up.
Okay.
(After seeing Lele) Honey, why did you drink so much?
(Feeling guilty and deciding to make it up to Xiao Tian) It’s okay, honey, I missed you.
(A month later) Honey, have you not had your period this month?
Yeah, it’s strange.
How about we go for a check-up?

content.content: Sure, let's use a pregnancy test, it'll be faster.
Checking your body is indeed important, but I’m a bit busy today, let’s do it another day.
How time-consuming a check-up is! I need to focus on work now.
A check-up? How long would that take? Let me think it over.

question: #question# How might Lele manage her time more efficiently?

content.content: You're right, the hospital is more authoritative. It’s always good to follow the doctor’s advice.
I believe what you say, but I’m a bit busy today. Let’s go another day.
Getting a check-up is part of self-care, but I’d still like to find the most suitable time to go. I'll decide on this myself.
(A little sheepishly) Thanks for your concern, hubby, but I don't think my condition is serious enough to require a check-up right now.

question: #question# How can Lele respond to show her trust in Xiao Jin?

dialog.content: Alright, you go ahead and check it out.
Oh my god, I'm really pregnant...
Ah, how can it be so accurate?
I kinda don't know what to do now.
I've always wanted a child. This is a great opportunity to have our own baby!

content.content: (Considering the child might be her lover's) But I really don't want a child now, I've decided to terminate it!
Okay, I know it's always been your wish too, so let's treat this newborn well!
Yeah, I'll listen to my husband. For the healthy birth of the baby later on, I'll take good care of myself at home.
I think you're right, but as the parents now, we need to consider the future more maturely.

question: #question# How should Le Le respond to Xiao Jin to show she's making the best decision?

content.content: (Suddenly feeling reluctant inside, but still decides to compensate Xiao Tian) Okay, I'll listen to my husband. After all, this is a life, and honestly, I can't quite let it go.
I know I should support your decision to have a baby, but the sense of responsibility towards the baby is overwhelming me. I'm scared of the arrival of this new life. I'll hesitate and think it over.
I don't feel there's any need to do anything for our future, I'm tired. I know this will hurt you, but I still want to live my own way. Don't use your thoughts to bind me.
I think I can live well even without considering you. I don't think you're wrong, so I don't intend to be responsible for you.

question: #question# How should Le Le respond to Xiao Jin to demonstrate her adherence to her moral beliefs?

dialog.content: Why! I can't believe you'd be so heartless. This is what I wanted most.
I'm sorry...
There's nothing more to say. We should just get a divorce!
Xiao Tian could no longer stand Lele's coldness and indifference and ultimately decided to divorce Lele.
I'm so happy! I'll definitely treat you and our child well in the future!

profile.name: Xiao Kong
profile.goal: The goal is to always be happy.

dialog.content: Lele, last time I saw Xiao Tian getting quite close with a female colleague when he was on a business trip. Look at the photos I took!
What? He's betraying me... and here I am, pregnant and suffering every day.
Well, I'm not sure. I just thought I'd remind you since being pregnant is no easy task.

content.content: Alright, if he dares to betray me, I won't care about our child either. I'm going to do something to betray him!
It's okay, I'll work hard to get this relationship back on track. You don't need to worry about me.
Thanks for your concern, but I'll focus on the child and won't want to get entangled with him anymore.
Oh, your observation is really detailed, but this big belly of mine might be the result of being too busy at work and sitting for too long.

question: #question#What will Lele do to show her retaliatory and flexible nature?

content.content: Thanks for the reminder. I'll calm down first and verify this later.
Haha, you're really quite funny, jumping from a big belly to childbirth. That's quite the imagination.
Thanks for the concern, but I'm actually not too bothered about his betrayal, though I appreciate you telling me.
Alright, if he dares to betray me, I won't care about our child either. I'm going to do something to betray him!

question: #question#How should Lele respond to show she's controlling her impulse?

dialog.content: Lele, calm down, you don't want to cause stress for your baby.
It's fine, I'll take care of myself. Thank you for the reminder.
Lele, why are you here? Did your husband upset you?

content.content: Yeah, he actually got cozy with another woman behind my back. I was almost furious to death, I just managed to come over and tell you, boo hoo.
Oh, Xiao Jin, you really can imagine things! I just wanted to chat with you and relax, what does this have to do with my husband?
Oh, what on earth are you thinking? My husband treats me well, I just realized I haven't shared life's little moments with you in a while, so I came to catch up!
Haha, Xiao Jin, you're hilarious! I came to show off my new hairstyle today, and get some fashion advice from you. It's got nothing to do with my husband.

question: #question# How should Lele respond to Xiao Jin's question to show she is managing her anger well?

content.content: No, it's just been a long time since we've met. Don't you want to see me?
Yes, my husband has always been unkind, that's why I came to find you.
Oh, Xiao Jin, you got part of it right. I do suspect my husband is up to something out there, so I came to see if you had any advice.
Haha, Xiao Jin, your imagination is so vivid! I actually came today to consult you about some work-related matters.

question: #question# How should Lele express her feelings towards Xiao Jin?
Skill

dialog.content: Your husband is just too much, I'm going to find him right now.
Who are you?
Don't worry about who I am. Bullying Lele means bullying me.
Lele, who is this?
I don't know...
Lele, you...

Xiao Jin couldn't bear Lele's indifference and left. Lele felt disappointed in both sides and eventually took her child and left, going far away. Although life was a bit tough, they managed to get by and gained freedom.
Hehe, of course, I do.
Then let's not talk about anything else and just enjoy this evening.
Alright!
Ah, my stomach hurts...
(Sees a pool of blood) Oh my God, I'll take you to the hospital right away.
Le Le unfortunately had a miscarriage, which became the catalyst for her to resolutely divorce Xiao Tian.
Alright, take care of yourself too.
Hubby, Xiao Kong took intimate photos of you with your female colleague. How could you betray me like this?
Ah, it's not what you think.
Don't say anything. I want a divorce.
Darling, you and our child are the ones I love most. I lost my way for a moment, but you are truly what I cherish!

content.content: As a father, you lack responsibility towards our family. You've made every mistake a man can make. I want a divorce, there's nothing to discuss.
I feel like we could give it another try and see if things improve.
I hope we can work hard together.
We might consider separating temporarily.

question: #question# How should Lele decide in response to Xiao Tian's admission?

content.content: Ah, since you're the father of my child and my beloved husband, come home soon, this house can't do without you.
It's still hard for me to accept. Trust requires time and actions to rebuild. For now, I still want to separate.
Hearing your sincerity has given me some comfort, but once trust is damaged, it's not easy to restore. You reap what you sow.
I really trusted you once, but now that you did this, I genuinely don't know what to do.
I feel like you might not love me anymore, and there's no hope for our relationship. Every time you come home, I sense your detachment.
Hearing your sincerity brings slight comfort, but rebuilding damaged trust isn't easy. You're reaping the consequences.
I truly believed in you once, but now I'm not sure if you really care about this family—I feel quite disappointed.

question: #question# How should Lele respond to show her trust in Xiao Tian?

dialog.content: Hey, can't you give me one more chance?
Don't say any more, I've already made up my mind.
Ah, I'm such an idiot...
Lele couldn't handle the betrayal, and in the end, their relationship fell apart, leading to divorce.
Thank you, honey. I will double my love for you all in the future.
Uh-huh, come on, cheer up.
Okay!! I love you!
I love you too.

Later, Lele successfully gave birth to the child and kept the affair a secret, continuing their life together. Xiao Tian, on the other hand, was constantly held accountable by Lele for his moral mistakes.
Right, let's head to the hospital where I know the doctor; it'll be more reliable for check-ups.
Okay, honey.
I heard from the doctor that when you found out you were pregnant, you immediately decided to get an abortion. Why did you do that? You know how much I love kids!
Ah, I'm sorry, darling, but I don't want this child.
Xiao Tian couldn't understand Lele's unilateral decision, especially on something that mattered most to him, and ultimately decided to divorce Lele.
Sure, you’re so thoughtful.
(Afterwards) It's getting late, I’m planning to head home.
Be careful on your way.
Honey, I’m back.
Did you drink too much? You look so tired. Maybe you should rest early.

content.content: Yeah, I really do feel exhausted. I’m going to wash up and sleep. Can you give me a shoulder rub?
(looking awkward and evasive) Haha, I was just thinking about something, actually not tired at all.
(very excited) Not at all, I'm not tired yet, how about watching a movie together?
Don’t worry, I still need to watch the new episode of a drama, I'm not sleeping yet!

question: #question# How does Lele cleverly respond to regulate her energy?

content.content: Hold on a minute, haven't seen you all night, I’ve missed you so much!
Don’t worry about me, I’d like to handle these myself.
I'm fine, don't worry, I don't need rest.
I feel like I can hold on a bit longer, no need to worry.

question: #question# How does Lele adapt to respond to her husband's needs?

dialog.content: Alright, dear.
(One month later) My period's late recently. I should check if there's anything wrong with my health.
Why don’t you go to the hospital I know?
Okay.
I heard from the doctor that you're pregnant?! Nothing happened between us last month, how could you be pregnant!
Ah. It's not what you think...
Xiao Tian couldn't handle Lele's betrayal and ultimately decided to divorce her.
I think about you every day, hehe.
(A month later) Honey, I think I might be pregnant...
What? That accurate! Am I going to be a dad?
But I don't want to have this child. I'm not ready yet.
I really can't understand. I can't believe you'd be so heartless, especially when this is what I've wanted most.
I'm sorry, please forgive my selfishness.
Xiao Tian still couldn't accept Lele's decision not to have the child, and in the end, decided to divorce Lele.
Alright, as long as it's her, I'm relieved. Come back soon.
Don't worry, honey.
You finally made it.
Spent a long time explaining things to my husband earlier, got delayed a bit. Let's go straight to the hotel.
Alright, dear.
Xiao Tian saw on social media that the friend Lele mentioned, a university classmate, hadn't returned to the country. Unable to bear the deceit, Xiao Tian ultimately decided to divorce Lele.
